Description: Basin (footed). Lotus-leaf flowers, based on Chinese lotus composition, in blue on white. Abraham of Kütayha type. Made of blue, turquoise, white painted and glazed pottery.
Bibliographic references: Atasoy & Raby 1989 / Iznik: The Pottery of Ottoman Turkey (fig.120, 311)
Rawson 1984 / Chinese Ornament: The Lotus and the Dragon (fig. 153, pl. 11)
Godman 1901 / The Godman collection of Oriental and Spanish pottery and glass, 1865-1900 (287)
Lane 1957 / Later Islamic Pottery: Persia, Syria, Egypt, Turkey (fig.27)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Frederick Du Cane Godman
